Row.Text: To do all that one is able to do, is to be human; to do all that one would like to do, is to be a god.
I am Napoleon, and I am here to decide the fate of the world.
I am Napoleon, and I am here to decide the fate of the world.
I am Napoleon, and I am here to decide the fate of the world.
I have made all the calculations; fate will do the rest.
The bullet that will kill me is not yet cast.
Exile. I shall write my memoirs. Work is the scythe of time.
The superior man is never in anyone's way.
One cannot treat with all the world at once.
